subtitle: Bad Request
content: It looks like there was an issue with your request. Please check the information you entered and try again.
If this issue persists, try contacting {Support}.

subtitle: Forbidden
content: You don't have permission to access the content on this server.
Contact {Support} if you believe this is an error.

subtitle: Method Not Allowed
content: The method you used to access this resource is not allowed.
Contact {Support} if you believe this is an error.

subtitle: Request Timeout
content: Your request took too long to process and has timed out.
Please try again in a few minutes, if this issue pesists try contacting {Support}.

subtitle: Internal Server Error
content: It looks like the server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling your request.
Please try again in a few minutes, if this issue pesists try contacting {Support}.

subtitle: Bad Gateway
content: It looks like the server is not ready to handle your request.
Please try again in a few minutes, if this issue pesists try contacting {Support}.

subtitle: Service Unavailable
content: The server is currently unable to handle your request.
Please try again in a few minutes, if this issue pesists try contacting {Support}.

subtitle: Gateway Timeout
content: The server took too long to respond to your request.
Please try again in a few minutes, if this issue pesists try contacting {Support}.
